headline: Graduate Student | Data Enthusiast
summary:
I am a Master's student in Information Technology and Management at Illinois Institute of Technology, where I learn about the latest trends and technologies in the field of data science, machine learning, and business analytics. I have completed multiple courses and certifications in these domains, and have participated in several projects and competitions, such as the Smart India Hackathon 2020, where I was a team leader and a finalist. I am passionate about using data to solve real-world problems and create value for businesses and society.

Also as a Data Science Intern at Srijan Technologies, I applied my data analysis skills to help the company deliver innovative and data-driven solutions for various clients. I worked with a team of data scientists and engineers to perform data preprocessing, exploratory data analysis, feature engineering, model building, and evaluation, using tools such as Microsoft 365, Python, R, and SQL.

experiences.title: Data Scientist
experiences.description:
●	Uncovered and analyzed key trends and patterns utilizing data mining techniques and various machine learning algorithms, resulting in a 15% increase in predictive accuracy for intrusion detection systems.
●	Developed a comprehensive Tableau dashboard to track company growth metrics, leading to a 20% improvement in decision-making processes based on real-time data visualization.
●	Implemented the YOLO v4 algorithm in a project that successfully identifies objects in images or videos in real-time, enhancing operational efficiency by 30% through automated object recognition.

experiences.title: Data Scientist
experiences.description:
●	Developed and implemented an innovative image-based search engine utilizing VGG19 algorithm and Convolutional Neural Networks, resulting in a 20% increase in user engagement and a 15% reduction in search time. 
●	Led the integration of data-driven dashboards and reports for network security, leading to a 30% decrease in incident response time by providing real-time insights into potential threats.
●	Utilized Google Analytics and Power BI to visualize data trends and generate actionable insights, contributing to a 25% increase in overall website traffic.

accomplishment_projects.title: Credit Card Fraud Detection
accomplishment_projects.description:
•	Implemented feature reduction techniques on credit card transaction dataset, resulting in the identification of key features utilized in various machine learning algorithms. Utilized Random Forest algorithm with a precision rate of 90% for fraud detection.
•	Utilized Python programming language to preprocess and clean credit card transaction data, ensuring high-quality input for machine learning models. Achieved a recall rate of 85% using Support Vector Machine algorithm for accurate fraud prediction.

accomplishment_projects.title: Retail Data analytics using Machine Learning
accomplishment_projects.description:
•	Implemented the Decision Tree algorithm with an unprecedented accuracy rate of 99% for predicting future sales, enabling better forecasting and strategic planning for optimizing revenue streams.
•	Collaborated with cross-functional teams to leverage findings from feature reduction analysis and algorithm testing to create actionable insights that resulted in a 20% increase in sales forecasting precision.
